patternDesigner_subtitle: Upload clothing and pattern images to start
patternDesigner_uploaderDescriptionCloth: Upload a photo of the shirt, dress, or pants you want to change.
patternDesigner_uploaderDescriptionPatte: Upload an image containing the pattern you want to apply.
Upload a second pattern to blend (optional).
patternDesigner_notesPlaceholder: e.g., only apply to the shirt body, keep the collar white...
patternDesigner_changeObjectColor: Change the color of an object
patternDesigner_regenPlaceholder: e.g., make the pattern smaller, change the background color...
patternDesigner_historyDescription: Check to use a result image below as the new clothing image.
patternDesigner_error_noClothing: Could not find a clothing image to generate from.
